page.title: 10Longfield Middle School
page.content: the Science syllabus. There is provision for teaching children who find basic skills difficult. At the end of this Summer Term several second year children will leave to go to the selective grammar schools in Dartford,and many more fourth year children will leave to go to the grammar schools in Gravesend. Many members of staff give up their own time to run extra-curricular activities for the children. There is a Parent Teacher Association which is very supportive of the school and raises funds to buy equipment. The school spent a week of the Summer Term researching and producing work for the Domesday Project.
